page.title: 04Housing, Rossall
page.content: Most houses are fairly well maintained except for council houses. Many properties were built about 50 years ago, although there are a few modern properties. A household consists of 3 bedrooms in the house or maybe more and also a telephone. Not many people are without telephones. Most people use their own car and only a few use public transport. The main religion is Church of England and a few had no religion at all. A majority of people work. Not many people have made additions to their houses as yet.
